hour_insured.description: Triv uses cutting-edge technology and ensures that you can trade with low latency. Unlike traditional stock markets, Triv's stock market is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

questions.title: What Are American Stocks?
questions.description: American stocks offer an opportunity for investors to invest in or trade shares of various US companies.

questions.title: Will I Earn Dividends from U.S. Stocks?
questions.description: Yes, all the stocks you invest in will pay dividends on the dates determined by the company.

questions.title: Who is allowed to trade?
questions.description: Anyone aged 17 or older who holds a KTP can register and trade tokenized stocks on Triv.

questions.title: Are there any additional costs?
questions.description: Besides the trading fee imposed by Triv, there are no additional costs to trade tokenized stocks.

questions.title: Are there any limitations?
questions.description: The sky is your limit!Tokenized stocks reflect the price of shares on traditional brokers. You can trade as much as you like, or HODL and invest based on your preferences.
